Home → Schools, literacy and reading → Reading advice & information

Reading advice & information

Pre-school children

Nurture their enjoyment of reading and prepare your children for learning to read at school.

Primary school age children

Support your child’s reading and emotional development, empathy and self-esteem.

Teenagers and Young Adults

Introduce your teenager to more complex and mature reading.

Dyslexia and Irlen syndrome

Find specially formatted books and help your child’s reading.
